author: Arsene Lupin III
subject: It's up! It's up! It's alllll up! I'm psyched!!!
body:
Well, most of it, anyway. The Fanfiction is not complete, and neither is
"Lupin I", "Editorials", or "Misc", and the links inside "Anime" are bad
right now, but other than that....
It's finally UP! 

Fan art! 
Banners! 
Chat! 
FAQ for Lupin NES video game! 
Download the Lupin NES game!
Links!
Fun, fun, fun!!!

It's all at: http://talesofthewolf.homepage.com

Send your opinions to:
< TalesoftheWolf@Juno.com >
Lupin the Third web site:
http://talesofthewolf.homepage.com
Mystery Science Theater 3000 Animated Online web site:
http://mst3000.homepage.com

Free software, free e-mail, and free Internet access for a month!
